00016 bool keywordWhile(MavenCompiler* c, string line, string& close) {
00017         int actionStart;
00018         string question = getStatementQuestion(line, actionStart);
00019         string action = trim(line.substr(line.find(')', question.length()) + 1));
00020

00040         
00041         return true;
